apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji portrays a loving couple formed by two women, both depicted with a rich medium-dark skin tone, celebrating diverse relationships. Their figures are rendered with Apple's signature soft 3D shading and smooth gradients, giving them a warm, lifelike presence and rounded edges that convey gentleness. The prominent heart between them radiates with a soft glow, symbolizing deep affection, commitment, and romantic love, all presented with Apple's unparalleled attention to detail and inclusive design.
